bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 1993.
bibl.note: 1. New observations on the fortification wall. - 2. The hall-building to the west of the Great Xenodochium. - 4 (sic). Further observations on the later medieval settlement. - 5. On the domed house.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter, Jacek KOSCIUK, Mohamed ABDAL-AZIZ NEGM and Christoph URICHER, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 1993.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 33 (1994) pp. 91-104, 6 figg., 2 plans dépl. et pll. XII-XV.
1. New observations on the fortification wall. - 2. The hall-building to the west of the Great Xenodochium. - 4 (sic). Further observations on the later medieval settlement. - 5. On the domed house.
